description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.description: This system view provides information about current database activity, including user names and query execution details.
panels.title: Total Users

panels.description: Displays the total number of active connections to your PostgreSQL databases.
panels.title: Total Active Connections on databases

panels.description: Shows the number of backend processes currently connected to each database. This includes all states (active, idle, idle in transaction, etc.).
panels.title: Number of Backends Connections

panels.description: Displays the total number of active connections to your PostgreSQL databases.
panels.title: Total Active Connections on databases

panels.description: Shows the number of backend processes currently connected to each database. This includes all states (active, idle, idle in transaction, etc.).
panels.title: Number of Backends Connections

panels.description: Displays the duration of the longest running active transaction, useful for identifying potential bottlenecks. Number of backends currently connected to this database. This is the only column in this view that returns a value reflecting current state; all other columns return the accumulated values since the last reset.
panels.title: Longest Running Transaction Duration

panels.description: This system view provides information about current database activity, including user names and query execution details.
panels.title: Total active users / time frame

panels.description: Number of times query called by user
panels.title: Rate of Query calls by 5m

panels.description: Displays the top 10 queries with the highest total execution time across the selected instance and database. This helps identify performance bottlenecks in your PostgreSQL queries.
panels.title: Top 10 Queries by Total Execution Time

panels.description: Measures the time delay, in seconds, between the primary and replica servers. This is a critical metric for replication health.
panels.title: Replication Lag (Seconds)

panels.description: This helps ensure that your replication slots are active and haven't failed.
panels.title: Number of Active Replication Slots

panels.description: Tracks the current WAL LSN for each replication slot. Useful for observing the progress, especially for logical slots.
panels.title: Replication Slot Current WAL LSN (logical)

panels.description: Shows the difference in Write-Ahead Log (WAL) Sequence Numbers (LSN) for replication slots, indicating lag in bytes per slot.
panels.title: Replication Slot Lag (Bytes)

panels.description: max duration in seconds any active transaction has been running
panels.title: Max transaction duration

title: Slow queries - V1.0
